players.name: Bob
memory: You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
You: "Charlie is the mafioso and I investigated him."
Charlie: "Stay vigilant, as the mafioso could be among us. I will continue to act innocent and gather information."
Votes: Bob voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
